definition: hill cemetery/graveyard/grave/grave mound/low wall at the back of a traditional tomb
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: He walked on the path in the cemetery alone and suddenly felt scared.
sentences.chinese: 他一個人走在墳山的小路上，突然感覺很害怕。

sentences.english: Marble busts all looked like a cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 大理石的半身象，簡直就象是墳山。
